Project

The Accidental Detective

Synopsis A true-crime enthusiast, Kang and veteran detective, Noh launches a joint murder investigation to help mutual friend who is wrongfully charged with murder.

Responsibilities

  • Developed marketing and promotional strategies
  • Managed all aspects of the Artwork and Trailer
  • Developed engaging, vital content to build social media audience
  • Wrote a media kit
  • Setting up film promotional events
  • Collated and distributed event materials

Marketing Overview

‘The Accidental Detective’ had many weaknesses in terms of marketing because the actors became less popular for many years and the genre of this film was not clear between comedy and thriller. It was too cruel to sell this movie as comedy genre and too simple as thriller genre. We decided that ‘comedy film with unexpected thrill’ would be the effective positioning strategy so our priority plan was making friendly and funny images of the actors and rediscovering charm of them as comedy actors. As a result, the film hit more than 3 million views and total revenues recorded more than double of the production budget. Thanks to the success of the film, the sequel ‘The Accidental Detective 2’ was released in 2018.

Marketing Keywords

  • Comic buddy movie
  • Making friendly images of the actors
  • Focusing an interesting murder case

Posters and Trailer

Marketing Campaigns

Press Screening To differentiate with common press screening, the actors wore characters' costume
Role Wrote the press kit and managed whole events

Artwork Collaboration To make friendly and young image of the actors, We collaborated with famous webtoon artist in South Korea
Role Worked with agency of the artist and planned online marketing strategies related to this caricature

Seasonal Promotion As it was an important holiday season, we made a seasonal campaign video clip using the comic scenes of this film related to family relationship
Role Proposed the item, wrote a script for this special video clip and uploaded it on SNS as an online viral marketing

Fan Event We hold the fan event giving free coffee for young university students to promote the film
Role Suggested the event theme, supervised artworks for the event, and managed the whole event
